name: IT201_Project01_Parnell_Provilon
description: The app allows the user to paint 3D objects in an open space. They can left click to create a single object or drag right click to create a stream of objects at their mouse cursor. The size of the objects are randomized and the colors can be changed through the use of three colors sliders for red, green, and blue respectively. There is a dropdown menu that allows the user to choose between a sphere, cube, or cylinder shape. The shapes disappear after 10 seconds or after the user clicks the “Clear All” button. The user’s mouse position is also recorded and displayed onscreen.
